Text:
Can't post today's show because the upload form is screwed up and missing image tag box... so it keeps asking for one even though I never entered one.

Will post it as soon as I can.  If you're a WDM Network member then you obviously don't have this problem.  Just use the links on there instead.  They will still work.
I was denied membership to WDM network because it said I had a proxy server? Whatever that is. Is there any other site I can get 10-22-12?
Is it because I have a wireless router? The signal on that thing doesn't go outside the house.
Hope the problem gets fixed soon!  It's torture to not have my daily dose of Howard :(
